about_the_game:
Computer Develop Simulator 2022 - it's inovation simulator there you replay the history of computer industry by starting your own company for computer construction. You can choose some ready components from other hardware companies or develop it yourself. You can choose parameters and some unique technologies for you computer. After you can sold it for increase your income for growth of bussines. You can choose cost of personal computers and hire personal. Keep track of the technological level, logistics, marketing and fanbase in order to keep your business afloat.

Starting in the 70s

Start your adventure in a small office in the 70s. Enjoy choosing computer components and other computer parameters. After some releases you can be little richer and you company can create computer components by itself

Grow your company

Once you have successfully developed and sold computers you can move into better office and hire more personal for your company.

Create and sold computers better than your competitors and become the best computer dev company in the world!
detailed_description:
Computer Develop Simulator 2022 - it's inovation simulator there you replay the history of computer industry by starting your own company for computer construction. You can choose some ready components from other hardware companies or develop it yourself. You can choose parameters and some unique technologies for you computer. After you can sold it for increase your income for growth of bussines. You can choose cost of personal computers and hire personal. Keep track of the technological level, logistics, marketing and fanbase in order to keep your business afloat.

Starting in the 70s

Start your adventure in a small office in the 70s. Enjoy choosing computer components and other computer parameters. After some releases you can be little richer and you company can create computer components by itself

Grow your company

Once you have successfully developed and sold computers you can move into better office and hire more personal for your company.

Create and sold computers better than your competitors and become the best computer dev company in the world!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R7 240
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100, AMD ryzen 1100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R7 240
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Computer Develop Simulator 2022

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100, AMD ryzen 1100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R7 240
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Computer Develop Simulator 2022 - it's inovation simulator there you can create your own company for computer construction. You can choose some ready components from other hardware companies or develop it yourself. You can choose parameters and some unique technologies for you computer.
